name: Pussy: Love Story from Titanic
overview: Leonardo, won a ticket for the maiden voyage of the greatest ship ever built, the "Titanic", where he meet Kate, a girl of his dreams, but their love was forbidden. Kate was rich, Leonardo was pooe and a thief. This was not the only problem... Pussy is a platform game with some action levels, you play Leonardo and the objective is to get in touch with Kate. Leonardo can not jump in most levels, but his fists are capable to smash a kind of bricks, and he can climb ladders. If Leo will smash a brick, all bricks over this one will fall down by one field, there are also teleport doors (very common on the original "Titanic") and a lot of enemies.
